page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE:R.Edwards.
page.content: I woke up at 7:45 a.m. and went down stairs to breakfast. On the way to school we let a train go past on the railway crossing.School starts at 9:00 a.m. and finishes at 3:30 p.m.,nearly everyone stays in school for lunch.I had chips,sausage and beans with rhubarb crumble and custard for pudding. In the afternoon we had games and Mr. Lloyd played football with us. After, we had an art lesson with Mr. John.My favourite lessons are Maths, English and Games.When we got home we watched television for an hour until supper at 6:00 p.m. For supper we had Liver,Bacon and Cabbage,Yuk!!!.After supper Mum read us a chapter of "The Woman in White" by Wilkie Collins and then we went to bed at 9:00 p.m. I read a James Bond novel for an hour.
